author: TV Guide
title: A Sequel to Disney Channel's Descendants Is in the Works
text: A Sequel to Disney Channel's Descendants Is in the Works A sequel is in the works for the wildly successful Disney Channel original movie Descendants.Tentatively titled Descendants 2, the movie will be written by original ... Comment Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 5:13 PM By TV Guide Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 5:13 PM A sequel is in the works for the wildly successful Disney Channel original movie Descendants . Tentatively titled Descendants 2 , the movie will be written by original screenwriters Sara Parriott and Josann McGibbon , who will also executive-produce the project, according to Disney. Descendants, which premiered in July, follows the teenage sons and daughters of Disney's biggest villains, including Maleficent ( Kristin Chenoweth ) and the Evil Queen ( Kathy Najimy ). It is the fifth highest-rated cable television movie of all time and has spawned the animated short-form series Descendants: Wicked World , which premiered on the Disney Channel and online. Are you looking forward to Descendants 2 ? VIDEO: Dove Cameron talks about the possibility of a Descendants sequel Other Links From TVGuide.com
